com.mobius.vdrapi
Class FilterFactory

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.mobius.vdrapi.ListFactoryWithSession
        |
        +--com.mobius.vdrapi.FilterFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
IHasSession, IListFactory
public class FilterFactory
extends ListFactoryWithSession

An FilterFactory can be created using a Session object as an input parameter. It uses the Filter search API and provides a list of pages requested from the document servers connected to that session.

The page list contents are based upon the specified search parameters.

Method Detail

applyPolicy

public IHasFieldInfo[] applyPolicy(String fullPolicyFileName)
Returns a list of filter field information to be used for search, the policy is also stored internally for filter by field

Parameters:
fullPolicyFileName - String specifying full path name of Policy file.
Returns:
IHasFilterField[] array, null if policy cannot be loaded

createList

public INode[] createList(QueryParam queryParam,
                          int requestCount)
                   throws ViewDirectException
Creates a list of FilterNode items based upon the query parameters.

Parameters:
queryParam - object used to specify the query parameters. This should be a FilterQueryParam object.
requestCount - int used to specify the number of expected results
Throws:
DataNotFoundException - thrown if the results set is empty.
ViewDirectException - thrown if there is an error in retrieving the list of document server objects.

getFactoryType

public SessionFactoryType getFactoryType()
Returns the applicable factory type.
